scripts.lint:size:report: eslint src --ignore-pattern '**/__tests__/**' --ignore-pattern '**/*.test.*' --format stylish 2>&1 | grep -E '(max-lines|complexity|error|warning)' | grep -v 'problems' || echo '✅ All files within limits'
scripts.lint:size:errors: eslint src --ignore-pattern '**/__tests__/**' --rule 'max-lines: [error, {max: 300}]' --format stylish 2>&1 | grep -E '(error.*max-lines|File has too many)' || echo '✅ No files over 300 lines'
scripts.lint:complexity: eslint src --ignore-pattern '**/__tests__/**' --format stylish 2>&1 | grep -E 'complexity' || echo '✅ No complexity issues'
